metatags.og:title: Indiana & Arizona Amend Data Breach Notification Laws
metatags.og:description: Indiana and Arizona have opened this spring with a pair of new amendments to their data breach notification laws. Indiana’s amendment alters the timeline for data breach notification, while Arizona’s adds another state regulator that may have to be notified.
